order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.select: select * from t_j_sale_ticket t where t.status = '4' and t.holder_type = '8' and t.holder = #{userOnlyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and exists (select 1 from t_j_sale_ticket_order o where t.ticketno = o.ticketno and o.ticket_type = '1' and o.status != '3')
